info.name: KeywordTracker
info.description: Be notified when a message matches a keyword :)

changelog.title: v1.6.0
items: Fix for new discord update

changelog.title: v1.5.5
items: Fix deprecated GuildStore.

changelog.title: v1.5.4
items: Fixed for latest betterdiscord update.

changelog.title: v1.5.3
items: Typo

changelog.title: v1.5.2
items: Fixed incorrect text coloring in empty inbox.

changelog.title: v1.5.1
items: Fixed light theme channel colors.
Removed titles from marked as read and jump to buttons (replaced by tooltips)

changelog.title: v1.5.0
items: Improved inbox icon
Fixed(?) weird line divider in the toolbar sometimes
No longer marks jumped-to messages as read by default.
Added an option in settings to mark messages as read when jumping to them.
Keywords can be filtered to just specific users, specific channels, and specific servers. Highly request feature I think!!! :3
Brand new inbox panel with cleaner buttons and pretty regex markdown!! Thank you ewan for the pr :3.
Cleanups and bugfixes

changelog.title: v1.4.6
items: Bugfixes

changelog.title: v1.4.5
items: Fixed for latest discord update.

changelog.title: v1.4.4
items: Fixed settings panel from not showing up.

changelog.title: v1.4.3
items: Fixed inbox not showing up.

changelog.title: v1.4.2
items: Removed test console log

changelog.title: v1.4.1
items: Fixed after breaking discord update.

changelog.title: v1.4.0
items: New user-keyword tracking! See keyword input description for details.

changelog.title: v1.3.9
items: Fixed dirtyDispatch being removed

changelog.title: v1.3.8
items: Improved embeds to not track unnecessary words.
Allow bot messages to be enabled or disabled

changelog.title: v1.3.7
items: A long requested feature: Keywords in embeds are now tracked! ^^

changelog.title: v1.3.6
items: Fixed bug with indicator not showing up.

changelog.title: v1.3.5
items: Fixed crash.

changelog.title: v1.3.4
items: Removed unnecessary logging

changelog.title: v1.3.3
items: Fixed clicking to notifications not jumping to location

changelog.title: v1.3.2
items: Fixed notifications

changelog.title: v1.3.1
items: Fixed user whitelist typo (thanks SoftwareSing)

changelog.title: v1.3.0
items: Fixed issues caused by ZLib's update.
Added toggle to let your own messages trigger notifications. Good for testing :)
Inbox should now show up on languages that are not english.

changelog.title: v1.2.6
items: Fixed inbox panel not showing up.

changelog.title: v1.2.5
items: Fixed memory leak in inbox panel.

changelog.title: v1.2.4
items: Fixed order of changelog.
Fixed the entire plugin, lol :)

changelog.title: v1.2.3
items: Fixed crashing issue related to jumping to a matched keyword.

changelog.title: v1.2.2
items: Actually, for realsies, fixes the issue (Thanks Meduxa)

changelog.title: v1.2.1
items: Hopefully fixes the issue of the keyword inbox button not appearing on some clients.

changelog.title: v1.2.0
items: Finally added an inbox, oh my god, why didn't I do this sooner.
You can find all recent missed matches from the last 60 days right next to the pinned messages button.

changelog.title: v1.1.1
items: Added user whitelist to receive all messages from a specific user. (Thank you @infernix!)
Updated README.md

changelog.title: v1.1.0
items: Updated descriptions for better clarity
Added server name in notification
Added more images
Added mass guild toggle switch
Added toggle switch to allow enabling / disabling of notification sounds.
Added field where you can exclude certain users from notifying you.

changelog.title: v1.0.7
items: Added internal check to update when guild is newly joined

changelog.title: v1.0.6
items: Fixed version not showing up on BD website

changelog.title: v1.0.5
items: Fixed issue where notifications would not play a sound.

changelog.title: v1.0.4
items: Set all channels to be enabled by default

changelog.title: v1.0.3
items: Fixed typo in RegexEscape
Changed notification icon to sender's profile picture

changelog.title: v1.0.2
items: Fixed dm channels causing console errors
Fixed update url

changelog.title: v1.0.1
items: Removed changes to global RegExp.escape
Updated meta info

items: Initial release.
